discover_best_chefs: Discover the Best Chefs in Your Area
discover_best_chefs_desc: Explore a variety of homemade dishes prepared by talented local chefs.
search_placeholder: Search for chefs, cuisines, or dishes...
wait_for_chefs: Please check back later as new chefs join our platform.
home.meet_our_chefs: Meet our expert chefs crafting delicious meals
customer_login_desc: Log in to your account to continue.
forgot_password_desc_initial: Enter your email to receive a password reset link.
forgot_password_desc_sent: If we find an account with that email, a password reset link will be sent.
feature_unavailable_desc_localstorage: This feature requires a backend server and email service, which are not available in this local storage-based demo.
customer_signup_desc: Create an account to start ordering.
chef_signup_desc: Join our platform and start selling.
validation_email_must_start_with_letter: Email must start with a letter.
validation_email_contains_invalid_chars: Email contains invalid characters. Only letters, numbers, and '._-' are allowed.
validation_email_invalid_format: Please enter a valid email format.
auth_incorrect_credentials: The credentials you provided are incorrect. Please try again.
something_went_wrong: Something went wrong. Please try again.
auth_email_in_use: This email address is already in use.
auth_password_requirements: Password must be at least 8 characters long and contain an uppercase letter, a lowercase letter, a number, and a symbol.
status_management_desc: Share updates, new dishes, or behind-the-scenes with your customers.
delete_status_warning: This will permanently delete your current status. This action cannot be undone.
no_active_status_desc: Share a photo or video with your followers.
this_chef_has_no_dishes: This chef hasn't added any dishes yet.
community_chat_desc: Connect with other foodies and share your experiences.
no_messages_yet: No messages yet. Start the conversation!
must_be_customer_to_chat: You must be a customer to access the community chat.
no_reviews_for_dish: No reviews for this dish yet.
your_favorite_dishes_desc: Your collection of saved dishes. Ready to order?
no_favorites_yet_desc: You haven't added any dishes to your favorites. Start exploring!
password_db_desc: This page is for demonstration purposes only. It shows the list of registered users. In a real application, this would not exist.
view_past_orders: View your past orders and leave reviews.
no_orders_yet_message: You haven't placed any orders yet.
bio_placeholder: Tell your customers a little about yourself and your cooking style.
update_error_desc: Could not save your changes. Please try again.
change_password_desc: Update your password. It is recommended to use a strong password.
password_changed_toast_desc: You can now use your new password to log in.
password_change_failed_toast_desc: Please check your input and try again.
logout_desc: You will be logged out of your account.
profile_picture_restored_to_default: Your profile picture has been restored to the default.
pending_orders_desc: You have {{count}} orders waiting from when you were busy. Check them out now!
popular_dishes_desc: Discover the plates that our customers love the most, crafted with passion by our talented chefs.
popular_dishes_empty: No popular dishes available at the moment. Check back soon!
chef_is_currently_closed_desc: This chef is not accepting orders right now.
login_required: Login required to place an order.
login_required_desc: Please log in or create an account to continue.
delivery_information_desc: We will deliver to this address. You can change it from your settings.
no_address_yet: No address provided yet. Please add one in your settings.
chef_is_busy_desc: The chef is busy with other orders. Your order will be added to a queue and processed as soon as they are available.
order_error_desc: Please log in and ensure you have a delivery address set in your settings.
order_sent_toast_review_desc: Your order for {{quantity}}x {{dishName}} has been sent to the chef for review.
order_sent_toast_waitlisted_desc: Your order has been placed in the queue!
coupon_limit_reached_error: This coupon has reached its usage limit.
coupon_not_applicable_error: This coupon is not valid for the selected dish.
caption_max_length: Caption cannot be longer than 150 characters.
inappropriate_language_detected: Your message contains inappropriate language and cannot be posted.
file_too_large_desc: Please upload a file smaller than {{size}}.
camera_access_denied_desc: Please allow camera access in your browser settings to use this feature.
coupon_code_min_length: Must be at least 3 characters long.
coupon_code_alphanumeric: Can only contain letters and numbers.
specific_dishes_desc: Select the dishes this coupon will apply to.
select_one_dish_for_specific: You must select at least one dish for a specific coupon.
no_dishes_to_add: You have no dishes to apply a coupon to.
end_date_after_start_date: End date must be after the start date.
must_be_chef: You must be a chef to perform this action.
coupon_management_desc: Create and manage your discount coupons.
no_coupons_desc: Create coupons to attract more customers!
dish_description_placeholder: A short, tasty description of your dish.
prep_time_positive: Prep time must be a positive integer.
dish_image_required: An image of the dish is required.
dish_updated_toast_desc: '{{name}}' has been updated in your menu.
dish_added_toast_desc: '{{name}}' is now available on your menu.
delete_dish_warning: This will permanently delete '{{name}}' from your menu. This action cannot be undone.
menu_management_desc: Add, edit, and manage the dishes you offer.
your_menu_is_empty_desc: Add dishes to your menu to start receiving orders.
reactions_on_your_status_desc: See who has reacted to your latest update.
no_reactions_yet_desc: Your status is live! Check back later to see reactions.
no_links_allowed: Links are not allowed in messages.
new_chef_bio: Passionate chef specializing in {{specialty}}. Bringing delicious, high-quality meals right to your door.
auth_must_be_logged_in_to_update: You must be logged in to update your profile.
auth_must_be_logged_in_to_change_passwor: You must be logged in to change your password.
must_be_customer_to_favorite: You must be a customer to favorite dishes.
order_waitlisted_notification_desc: Your order for {{dishName}} is in the queue!
new_waitlisted_order_notification_desc: {{customerName}} placed an order while you were busy.
order_confirmed_notification_desc: Your order for {{dishName}} is being prepared.
order_rejected_notification_desc: We're sorry, your order for {{dishName}} was rejected.
popular_dishes_desc: Enjoy your favorite meals from top chefs
no_popular_dishes: No popular dishes available at the moment
special_offers_desc: Save money with our amazing specials
no_discounted_dishes: No special offers available at the moment
ready_to_try: Ready to try your next meal with us?
download_app: Download the app now and get 20% off your first order
fast_delivery_desc: Get your food delivered in under 30 minutes
free_shipping_desc: Free shipping on all orders over EGP 100
fresh_food_desc: Made with the finest fresh ingredients daily
